content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
Everyday I meet my boyfriend, I feel I am in a black hole. He is too demanding and keeps an eye on my life.
I see. It seems that you are in a very difficult spot with your boyfriend. Do you know what kind of things he is doing to you?
He threatens to break up if I don't obey him, when he asks me to stay with him, go shopping with him, meeting his friends, dadada.
Oh that' s terrible. I can understand why you feel that you are being treated that way. I have been in situations similar to that where I' ve been hurt..
